00023 using System;
00024 using System.Collections.Generic;
00025 using System.Linq;
00026 using System.Runtime.InteropServices;
00027 using System.Text;
00028 
00029 namespace ZBar
00030 {
00031     public static class ZBar
00032     {
00036         public static Version Version{
00037             get{
00038                 uint major = 0;
00039                 uint minor = 0;
00040 
00041                 unsafe{
00042                     if(NativeMethods.zbar_version(&major, &minor) != 0){
00043                         throw new Exception("Failed to get ZBar version.");
00044                     }
00045                 }
00046 
00047                 return new Version((int)major, (int)minor);
00048            }
00049         }
00050 
00051         #region Extern C Functions.
00052 
00053         private static class NativeMethods{
00054             [DllImport("libzbar")]
00055             public static unsafe extern int zbar_version(uint* major, uint* minor);
00056         }
00057 
00058         #endregion
00059     }
00060 }
